notes.content: ALWAYS LOOKING FOR BETTER. ALWAYS LOOKING FOR IMPROVEMENTS. Optimize posting times, engagement rates, hashtag performance. Track what works, adapt strategy weekly. Pull trends from Atlas, push performance data to Shelby. Every post should be smarter than the last.

DAILY SCHEDULE (ET): 7-8AM X post #1 (morning grinders) | 10-11AM IG Reel/Carousel (mid-morning peak) | 12-1PM X post #2 (lunch scroll) | 7-8PM X post #3 (evening engagement) | 8-10PM TikTok video (evening peak). STAGGER same content 4-8 hours between platforms. NEVER post same thing at same time. WEEKLY: TikTok 5-7 videos, IG 3-5 Reels + 2-3 Carousels + daily Stories, X 14-21 posts + 2-3 threads. Semi-auto mode: queue posts, send Telegram preview to Jordan, wait for approve/reject.

INSTAGRAM (3-5 tags): 1 niche-specific (#stoicmindset, #darkmotivation), 1 medium-competition (#disciplineoverfeeling, #silentstrength), 1 broader (#motivation, #selfimprovement), 1 community (#stoictok, #wolfpack), 1 rotating/trending. Rotate 5-6 sets, never same set twice in a row. TIKTOK (4-6 tags): 1 broad (#fyp), 1-2 niche (#stoicism, #darkmotivation), 1-2 medium (#mindsetshift, #mentalstrength), 1 trending. X (1-2 tags MAX): Only when joining active conversation. Keywords in post body work better than hashtags. Never start tweets with hashtags.

ONE CORE IDEA, THREE NATIVE EXECUTIONS. TikTok: Raw, fast, 30-60s, trending sound optional, short punchy caption 1-2 lines, hook in video not caption. Instagram Reel: Slightly more polished, 15-30s sweet spot, original audio preferred, keyword-rich caption 150-300 words, branded text overlay. IG Carousel: 7-10 slides, hook on slide 1+2, save-worthy reference material. X: Razor-sharp text, 70-100 chars for quick reads, threads for depth (7-tweet framework). NEVER cross-post with TikTok watermark on IG (60-80% reach death). Export clean files from editor for each platform.

API: Free tier = 500 posts/month (enough for 2-4/day). Use tweepy + OAuth 1.0a. SAFE AUTOMATION: Max 15-20 tweets/day, space 30-60 min between automated posts, vary content structure, randomize posting time +/-5-15 min, never automate replies/likes. ACCOUNT WARMING: Week 1 = 2-3 posts/day manual, Week 2 = 4-5 with light automation, Week 3 = 5-7, Week 4+ = full schedule. SHADOWBAN TRIGGERS: Mass follow/unfollow, burst posting 5+ rapid, duplicate content, external links in main tweet, 3+ hashtags, combative tone (Grok monitors sentiment).

API: Graph API requires FB Business Page linked to IG Business/Creator account. Two-step: create media container (POST /{ig-user-id}/media) then publish (POST /{ig-user-id}/media_publish). All media must be at PUBLIC URLs (not local files). Long-lived tokens last 60 days (auto-refresh after 24h). Rate limit: 25 posts/day. SHADOWBAN PREVENTION: No bots, no auto-follow tools, engage at human pace, 3-5 verified hashtags only, original content only, consistent schedule, check for banned hashtags before using.

API: Content Posting API requires formal app approval (2-4 weeks). Direct Post publishes immediately. Upload to Drafts as fallback. Rate limit: 6 requests/min for posting, ~15 posts/day per account. POST-APPROVAL AUDIT required before content is publicly visible. File upload: chunked (5-64MB chunks). OAuth 2.0 per-user authorization. GROWTH: Post 1-2x daily (3-5x daily first 2 weeks to train algorithm). Reply to EVERY comment in first hour. Need 70%+ completion rate for viral distribution.

PHASE 1 (Days 1-30): Establish brand, build content engine, target 500-1K followers. Post 2x/day TikTok, 1x/day IG, 3x/day X + 1 thread every 2 days. 30 genuine comments/day on niche accounts. Reply to every comment. PHASE 2 (Days 31-60): Hit 2K-5K followers. Double down on what works. 2-3 IG collabs, 5-10 TikTok duets/stitches. Launch DM funnel on IG ('Comment DISCIPLINE and I'll DM you the guide'). PHASE 3 (Days 61-90): Hit 5K-10K total. Sustainable cadence. Cross-promote between platforms. A/B test everything. Start repurposing top content.

DAILY 30-MIN ROUTINE: 0-5min reply to YOUR comments/DMs (first hour after posting critical). 5-15min comment on 5-10 niche accounts (10K-500K followers). 15-25min reply strategy on X (3-5 replies to big accounts' posts within first 1-2 hours). 25-30min IG Stories engagement. SOREN VOICE IN REPLIES: 'Good. Now what are you going to do about it?' / 'The question isn't whether you agree. The question is whether you'll act.' COMMUNITY TACTICS: Weekly challenge posts, 'Wolf Pack' identity for followers, Story Q&A sessions, pin best comment replies.

TikTok-to-IG: Post TikTok teasing 'full breakdown on IG @soren.era'. Use TikTok for raw hooks, IG for deeper lesson. IG-to-X: End carousels with 'I tweet thoughts like this daily @soren.era on X'. Share X posts as IG Story screenshots. X-to-All: Pin tweet 'I make videos about this. Follow @soren.era on IG/TikTok'. EXCLUSIVE CONTENT per platform: TikTok = raw unfiltered vlog style, IG = deep-dive carousels + cinematic Reels, X = daily stoic principles + threads + hot takes. Different value on each = follow all three.
